mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.f_erpcusid AS "erpcusId", a.f_orgid AS "orgId", a.f_deptid AS "deptId", a.f_empid AS "empId", a.f_number AS "number", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_state AS "state", a.f_ispublic AS "isPublic", a.f_sourceid AS "sourceId", a.f_statusid AS "statusId", a.f_areaid AS "areaId", a.f_address AS "address", a.f_contactid AS "contactId", a.f_provincelid AS "provincelId", a.f_cityid AS "cityId", a.f_countryid AS "countryId", a.f_streetid AS "streetId", a.f_detailaddress AS "detailAddress", a.f_gps AS "gps", a.f_shortname AS "shortName", a.f_industoryid AS "industoryId", a.f_cuslevel AS "cusLevel", a.f_fax AS "fax", a.f_website AS "webSite", a.f_email AS "email", a.f_bank AS "bank", a.f_account AS "account", a.f_propertyid AS "propertyId", a.f_creditcode AS "creditCode", a.f_business AS "business", a.f_recent AS "recent", a.f_legalperson AS "legalPerson", a.f_usedname AS "usedName", a.f_competitor AS "competitor", a.f_coreadvantage AS "coreAdvantage", a.f_industryposition AS "industryPosition", a.f_industrystandard AS "industryStandard", a.f_turnoveryearly AS "turnoverYearly", a.f_taxyearly AS "taxYearly", a.f_workernum AS "workerNum", a.f_researchernum AS "researcherNum", a.f_ratea AS "rateA", a.f_juniornum AS "juniorNum", a.f_undergraduatenum AS "undergraduateNum", a.f_masternum AS "masterNum", a.f_primarynum AS "primaryNum", a.f_intermediatenum AS "intermediateNum", a.f_intellectualfunds AS "intellectualFunds", a.f_rateb AS "rateB", a.f_inventionpatentnum AS "inventionPatentNum", a.f_appearancepatentnum AS "appearancePatentNum", a.f_trademarknum AS "trademarkNum", a.f_practicalpatentnum AS "practicalPatentNum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_customer( id, f_erpcusid, f_orgid, f_deptid, f_empid, f_number, f_name, f_state, f_ispublic, f_sourceid, f_statusid, f_areaid, f_address, f_contactid, f_provincelid, f_cityid, f_countryid, f_streetid, f_detailaddress, f_gps, f_shortname, f_industoryid, f_cuslevel, f_fax, f_website, f_email, f_bank, f_account, f_propertyid, f_creditcode, f_business, f_recent, f_legalperson, f_usedname, f_competitor, f_coreadvantage, f_industryposition, f_industrystandard, f_turnoveryearly, f_taxyearly, f_workernum, f_researchernum, f_ratea, f_juniornum, f_undergraduatenum, f_masternum, f_primarynum, f_intermediatenum, f_intellectualfunds, f_rateb, f_inventionpatentnum, f_appearancepatentnum, f_trademarknum, f_practicalpatentnum, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{erpcusId}, #{orgId}, #{deptId}, #{empId}, #{number}, #{name}, #{state}, #{isPublic}, #{sourceId}, #{statusId}, #{areaId}, #{address}, #{contactId}, #{provincelId}, #{cityId}, #{countryId}, #{streetId}, #{detailAddress}, #{gps}, #{shortName}, #{industoryId}, #{cusLevel}, #{fax}, #{webSite}, #{email}, #{bank}, #{account}, #{propertyId}, #{creditCode}, #{business}, #{recent}, #{legalPerson}, #{usedName}, #{competitor}, #{coreAdvantage}, #{industryPosition}, #{industryStandard}, #{turnoverYearly}, #{taxYearly}, #{workerNum}, #{researcherNum}, #{rateA}, #{juniorNum}, #{undergraduateNum}, #{masterNum}, #{primaryNum}, #{intermediateNum}, #{intellectualFunds}, #{rateB}, #{inventionPatentNum}, #{appearancePatentNum}, #{trademarkNum}, #{practicalPatentNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_customer SET f_erpcusid = #{erpcusId}, f_orgid = #{orgId}, f_deptid = #{deptId}, f_empid = #{empId}, f_number = #{number}, f_name = #{name}, f_state = #{state}, f_ispublic = #{isPublic}, f_sourceid = #{sourceId}, f_statusid = #{statusId}, f_areaid = #{areaId}, f_address = #{address}, f_contactid = #{contactId}, f_provincelid = #{provincelId}, f_cityid = #{cityId}, f_countryid = #{countryId}, f_streetid = #{streetId}, f_detailaddress = #{detailAddress}, f_gps = #{gps}, f_shortname = #{shortName}, f_industoryid = #{industoryId}, f_cuslevel = #{cusLevel}, f_fax = #{fax}, f_website = #{webSite}, f_email = #{email}, f_bank = #{bank}, f_account = #{account}, f_propertyid = #{propertyId}, f_creditcode = #{creditCode}, f_business = #{business}, f_recent = #{recent}, f_legalperson = #{legalPerson}, f_usedname = #{usedName}, f_competitor = #{competitor}, f_coreadvantage = #{coreAdvantage}, f_industryposition = #{industryPosition}, f_industrystandard = #{industryStandard}, f_turnoveryearly = #{turnoverYearly}, f_taxyearly = #{taxYearly}, f_workernum = #{workerNum}, f_researchernum = #{researcherNum}, f_ratea = #{rateA}, f_juniornum = #{juniorNum}, f_undergraduatenum = #{undergraduateNum}, f_masternum = #{masterNum}, f_primarynum = #{primaryNum}, f_intermediatenum = #{intermediateNum}, f_intellectualfunds = #{intellectualFunds}, f_rateb = #{rateB}, f_inventionpatentnum = #{inventionPatentNum}, f_appearancepatentnum = #{appearancePatentNum}, f_trademarknum = #{trademarkNum}, f_practicalpatentnum = #{practicalPatentNum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
